issue.title: Impossible to publish or unpublish a resource type.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

For info, this defect is still here in 4.2.0-beta-2.

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Please any info on this defect ???


_PS : the only way not to display a resource type is to set scope to "no user" or... delete the resource type !_
